alert.note: Alert for Labette; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 4:55AM CDT until September 08 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Labette County in southeastern Kansas... Southern Neosho County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 455 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Galesburg, or 8 miles northwest of Parsons, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Parsons, Oswego, Labette, Parsons Tri City Airport, Lake Parsons, Dennis, South Mound, and Big Hill Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
